reviewText: I'd read the original book years ago, and then while visiting England, I saw the movie broadcast on British TV!  I very much enjoyed both the book and movie, although I liked the book more since the movie simplified the plot somewhat.  Still the acting was very good and the tale was deftly woven.
Excellent movie with George Sanders playing a more sympathetic character than usual.
Terrific old movie A great cast. Love watching it.
